name: Update Task Schema
description: A schema for updating tasks in the streamline application

userId.description: The id of the user creating the task

category.description: The id of the category the task belongs to

dueDate.description: The date the task is due to be completed

priority.description: The priority id of the task

list.description: The id of the list the task is on

status.description: The id of the status of the task
